attributes.action: Save Workington fire engine / Oppose all Cumbria Fire & Rescue Service cuts
attributes.additional_details: Cumbria County Council have made proposals to cut fire engines from the following stations, Barrow, Penrith, Kendal, Whitehaven, Maryport, Dalton and WORKINGTON. These cuts will affect turnout times and have a negative effect on public and fire fighter safety. We oppose all the cuts to Cumbria Fire & Rescue.
